meanings: (several/many/a few/some) years, a number of years

vlive.korean: 수년 동안 제가 해오던 일이었는데요. what I've been doing for years. 듣기 View video V Special : [REPLAY] 2016 대한민국 대중문화 예술상 시상식
vlive.english: what I've been doing for years.

vlive.korean: 수년 동안 여러번 알고지낸 두 캐릭터요. the two characters you've seen numerous times over the years. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : '영원한 울버린' <휴 잭맨> 현지 생중계 V라이브 'Hugh Jackman X Patrick Stewart V LIVE @Taipei'
vlive.english: the two characters you've seen numerous times over the years.

vlive.korean: 수년 동안. - 저희가 이 노래를 진짜 엄청 들었어요. For many years. - So we listened to it all the time. 듣기 View video BTOB : [FULL] 비투비 그리워하다 16일 돼버렸어
vlive.english: For many years. - So we listened to it all the time.

vlive.korean: 죽기 전에 십수 년 간 한국인은 병자로 살아요. For about dozen years before death, they live as a patient. 듣기 View video V BOOKS : 김홍신 작가 북토크 생중계, '36.5도로 오래 가는 사랑을 이야기하다'
vlive.english: For about dozen years before death, they live as a patient.

vlive.korean: 앞으로는 감독상으로 수 년 내로 오실 수 있었으면 좋겠습니다. I hope we can see you in a few years for Best Director Award. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 디렉터스컷 어워즈 시상식 스팟라이브
vlive.english: I hope we can see you in a few years for Best Director Award.

examples.korean: Many years elapsed before they met again. 발음듣기 수년이 흐른 뒤에야 그들은 다시 만났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Many years elapsed before they met again. 발음

examples.korean: They endured years of suffering and privation. 발음듣기 그들은 수년간의 고통과 궁핍을 견뎠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They endured years of suffering and privation. 발음

examples.korean: Her husband had been deceiving her for years. 발음듣기 그녀의 남편이 그녀를 수년 동안 속여 왔던 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her husband had been deceiving her for years. 발음

examples.korean: Years of work went into researching the book. 발음듣기 그 책을 위한 자료 조사에 수년간의 작업이 투입되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Years of work went into researching the book. 발음

examples.korean: Her features had been bloated by years of drinking. 발음듣기 수년간의 음주로 그녀는 얼굴 생김새가 푸석하니 부어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her features had been bloated by years of drinking. 발음
